fi.tamk.lucidstudio.tiltbeat

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.lucidstudio.tiltbeat.GameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public class GameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    This class is the game screen that contains the gameplay.

      • moveNotes

        public int moveNotes(int a)
        calculates a new sector for a note on an inactive sector. the number of consecutive sectors inactive = the number of sectors the note is moved forward
        Parameters:
        a - the sectors index number in need of checking
        Returns:
        the new sector for the note
